alert.note: Alert for Southern Oglala Lakota (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued December 24 at 3:56PM MST until December 26 at 11:00PM MST by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM MONDAY TO 11 PM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 9 inches, highest amounts generally over southeastern Oglala Lakota County. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Southern Oglala Lakota County. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Pine Ridge Reservation. * WHEN...From 5 PM Monday to 11 PM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: A Blizzard Warning means the combination of snow, blowing snow, and strong winds will create dangerous whiteout conditions. Road conditions are available on your smartphone from the 5 1 1 app for your state.
